content: दर्शक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (का|र्शिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [दृश्-णिच् ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Seeing, observing, &c. {@--2@} Showing, pointing out; <ls>Ku. 6. 52.</ls> {@--3@} Examining, looking out for. {@--4@} Explaining, making clear, elucidating. --कः {@--1@} One who shows or exhibits. {@--2@} A door-keeper, warder. {@--3@} A skilful man, one proficient in any art or science.
